Title: Jesse Stone: Death in Paradise
Writer: Robert B. Parker (novel), J.T. Allen (teleplay), Tom Selleck (teleplay), Michael Brandman (teleplay)
Actors: Tom Selleck, Viola Davis, Kohl Sudduth, Orla Brady
Plot: A body's found on the shore of a lake. Police Chief Jesse Stone starts an investigation. It turns out to be a pregnant high school student. There's also a case of a persistent wife beater. Jesse starts seeing a shrink and dating.
